name: NEORIS
description: NEORIS is a global business and IT consulting company that specializes in SAP and application outsourcing. We establish long-term relationships with our clients, helping them improve performance throughout the different stages of their business. Our unique global delivery model, combined with cutting-edge IT services, allows us to innovate, build, deploy and operate business solutions that are both practical and visionary.
